Package org.apache.xpath.operations

Support for XPath operations, such as +, -, string(), etc.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    And
    The 'and' operation expression executer.
    ArrowOp
    Implementation of XPath 3.1 arrow operator, "=>".
    Bool
    The 'boolean()' operation expression executer.
    CastableAs
    The XPath 3.1 "castable as" operation.
    CastAs
    An implementation of XPath 3.1 "cast as" expression evaluation.
    Div
    An XPath 'div' operation implementation.
    Equals
    The '=' operation expression executer.
    Except
    An implementation of XPath 'except' operation.
    Gt
    The '>' operation expression executer.
    Gte
    The '>=' operation expression executer.
    IDiv
    An XPath 'idiv' operation implementation.
    InstanceOf
    An implementation of XPath 3.1 'instance of' operator.
    Intersect
    An implementation of XPath 'intersect' operation.
    Lt
    The '<' operation expression executer.
    Lte
    The '<=' operation expression executer.
    Minus
    An XPath '-' operation implementation.
    Mod
    An XPath 'mod' operation implementation.
    Mult
    An XPath '*' operation implementation.
    Neg
    The unary '-' operation expression executer.
    NodeComparisonFollows
    The XPath 3.1 node comparison ">>" operation.
    NodeComparisonIs
    The XPath 3.1 node comparison "is" operation.
    NodeComparisonPrecede
    The XPath 3.1 node comparison "<<" operation.
    NotEquals
    The '!=' operation expression executer.
    Number
    The 'number()' operation expression executer.
    Operation
    The base class for an XPath binary operation.
    Or
    The 'or' operation expression executer.
    Plus
    An XPath '+' operation implementation.
    Quo Deprecated 
    Range
    The XPath 3.1 range "to" operation.
    SimpleMapOperator
    An implementation of XPath 3.1 simple map '!' operator.
    StrConcat
    The XPath 3.1 string concatenation "||" operation.
    String
    The 'string()' operation expression executer.
    TreatAs
    The XPath 3.1 "treat as" operation.
    UnaryOperation
    The unary operation base class.
    Variable
    The variable reference expression executer.
    VariableSafeAbsRef
    This is a "smart" variable reference that is used in situations where an absolute path is optimized into a variable reference, but may be used in some situations where the document context may have changed.
    VcEquals
    The XPath 3.1 value comparison "eq" operation.
    VcGe
    The XPath 3.1 value comparison "ge" operation.
    VcGt
    The XPath 3.1 value comparison "gt" operation.
    VcLe
    The XPath 3.1 value comparison "le" operation.
    VcLt
    The XPath 3.1 value comparison "lt" operation.
    VcNotEquals
    The XPath 3.1 value comparison "ne" operation.
    XPathGeneralComparisonEqualityOpSupport
    A class providing implementation methods, to support evaluation of XPath general comparison operators =, !=.
    XPathGeneralComparisonRelationalOpSupport
    A class providing implementation methods, to support evaluation of XPath general comparison operators <, <=, >, >=.

Package org.apache.xpath.operations Description

Support for XPath operations, such as +, -, string(), etc.
